slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.candidate_factory.factories.factory_ABC module

class slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.candidate_factory.factories.factory_ABC.CandidateFactory[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract class for any candidate factory.

abstract property graph_candidate

Graph candidate to be merged with the graph.

abstract candidate_ready() → bool[source]

Candidate readiness status.

abstract synchronize_states() → None[source]

Synchronizes states of the candidate based on criteria.

abstract process_storage(storage: MeasurementStorage) → None[source]

Processes the storage with measurements and adds new states to the graph candidate if needed.

Parameters:

storage – storage with measurements.

abstract init_table(config: dict[str, str]) → None[source]

Initializes “handler -> state analyzer” table.

Parameters:

config – config with “handler name -> state analyzer name” table.
